reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, describing it as looking and feeling expensive, and appreciate its flattering fit that accommodates various body types. The dress receives positive feedback for its material quality, with one customer noting its forgiving texture, and customers like its gold shade that's not too brassy. While customers find the dress comfortable and well-made, they report issues with the zipper bei

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunner!
items.body: This dress is STUNNING. I'm 5'3"... 130lbs and it fits perfectly (I plan to wear a 3" heel). It's lined, tight around the ribcage and flows out/down from there, making it perfectly comfortable. Some people have commented on the zipper - it was tad tricky to zip at my ribcage, but then zipped easily. I plan to wear this for an autumn wedding. Read more
items.author: Holly Gentry

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars As pictured - Stunning on!
items.body: Love it! Very well made. The gold is like studio 54 vibe gold - not bright - perfect stylish Greek vibe. Donâ€™t follow their size chart - order true to your size as I followed their recommendation however, order your size not up. Elegant, stylish & classy, beautiful on. Very comfortable on and hides the tummy area. It does run long but heels fixes that. The gold has a vintage vibe from the 70s. You can also wear it backwards (to cover my shoulder tattoo) ðŸ¤£. Read more
items.author: Tina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress
items.body: Beautiful dress. It fit perfectly and I loved how flowy it was. Very wrinkle resistant and perfect thickness for an early fall wedding in the Midwest. I was so comfortable all night which was huge for me being post partum. Read more
items.author: Cydney Johnson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing dress, horrible zipper.
items.body: This dress is amazing! I went up one size because I have a wide bust but other than that it fit perfect. I'm a shorty about 5'3 and it didn't drag on the ground. I wore it for a cruise and got so many compliments, I felt beautiful in it! It was packed in a suitcase and didn't wrinkle. I would buy again. ALMOST 5 stars but the zipper is such a piece of junk, its the cheapest zipper you could find. I just took the dress on and off over my head. Read more
items.author: Jennifer Flynn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress
items.body: Gorgeous dress! Eautiful color! I am a plus sized woman and was t sure how this would look on me. I wore it for a 1950â€™s old Hollywood glam party. I loved the comfort of this dress and the length with 5-inch platform shoes. I am a size 16 and 5 ft 4 in tall. The material is not super thin and the dress is not lined. I didnâ€™t feel the need to wear a slip underneathâ€¦but I rarely wear them anyway. I am thick thru the waist so the top was a little big on me. I had to fold it in with fabric tape. Read more
items.author: TMJâ¤ï¸KMJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect find! Exactly what I need for mom's big day!
items.body: This dress was purchased for my mother's 78 Birthday celebration at her fave juke joint. We chose a size small and it fit her very well. We didn't want a full maxi length so we cut it to the knee. Because there is no hem at the bottom, cutting it was a breeze and didn't require any sewing. Quality is nice. Secure zipper and pleats and drape were beautiful. No weird smells. You won't regret this purchase... Read more
items.author: Julz da Goddess

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and nice
items.body: I love this dress I want it in every color. The zipper is small thatâ€™s the only thing I didnâ€™t like. Read more
items.author: Monica Conrod

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress, just too large in chest
items.body: The dress is beautiful but the chest was too large for me so I had to return. I ordered a small (32c, 26â€ waist, 5â€™3â€). This would not require hemming if I wore heels, so this dress works well with petite height. The color was STUNNING, but again the chest area was too large so I had to return. Read more
items.author: Ashleigh

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress One Shoulder Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress One Shoulder Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Wine, Gold, Purple, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
